errors.error_description: Uses incorrect Django management command syntax with invalid settings parameter format
correction_candidates: To install dependencies, run `pip install -r requirements/dev.txt` and then `python manage.py migrate --settings pretalx.settings.development`.
To install dependencies, run `pip install -r requirements/dev.txt` and then `DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=pretalx.settings.development python manage.py migrate`.
To install dependencies, run `pip install -r requirements/dev.txt` and then `python manage.py migrate -s pretalx.settings.development`.
To install dependencies, run `pip install -r requirements/dev.txt` and then `python manage.py migrate --config=pretalx.settings.development`.
errors.golden_answer: To install dependencies, run `pip install -r requirements/dev.txt` and then `DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=pretalx.settings.development python manage.py migrate`.
